about_the_game:
Dive back into the enthralling world of the hit PC game, Cepheus Protocol, with this gripping second installment in the Cepheus Protocol book series. "Cepheus Protocol: The Last Line" takes you on an adrenaline-fueled journey through a world teetering on the edge of apocalypse.

Robert Pierce, a veteran officer of the San Francisco Police Department, serves as our stalwart protagonist. When a deadly epidemic descends upon Treasure Island, transforming its inhabitants into horrifying monsters, he quickly finds himself ensnared in a desperate battle for survival.

With his city in chaos, his family far beyond his reach, and the hopes of escape extinguished, Pierce grapples with an unbearable burden of guilt and regret. His struggle is not just against the infected, but also against his own haunted past and the terrifying prospect of an uncertain future.

Against insurmountable odds, Pierce must confront not only the physical threats that lurk in every shadow, but also the emotional and psychological demons that plague his every thought. "Cepheus Protocol: The Last Line" explores Pierce's internal struggles with raw and ruthless honesty, making it a gripping exploration of human resilience and determination.

Can Pierce lead a group of survivors through the ruins of the city, stand against the horrors the virus has created, and find his own personal peace in the process? As the last line of defense, he and his team must fight to protect the remnants of humanity and keep hope alive in a world on the brink of ruin.

Based on the immersive gameplay and intricate storytelling of the PC game, Cepheus Protocol, this novel stands as a testament to humanity's will to survive even in the face of utter despair.

Whether you're a fan of the game, an avid reader of dystopian fiction, or someone who revels in a raw, honest exploration of human spirit, "Cepheus Protocol: The Last Line" is a compelling read that will keep you hooked until the very end.

Embrace the chaos, face your fears, and join Pierce in this thrilling sequel. Will you answer the call to be the last line?

Instructions are as follows:
==========================
Upon purchase, this book will be downloaded to your computer in one format: pdf. To access your ebook, navigate to the ebook folder in your Cepheus Protocol game folder.
* Right click Cepheus Protocol in your Steam Library
* Select Properties
* Go to the Local Files tab
* Click Browse Local Files
* Open the ebook folder
* To read the book on your mobile device, transfer the pdf ebook reader app. Enjoy!
==========================
